title: Klastline
whats_it_like: A northern BC adventure. Remote and with only a handful of descents the Klastline is a good option for anyone who plans to be in the area and wants to run something other than the Stikine. Some class 4 bedrock rapids, 2 big waterfalls (one that has yet to be run) and some steep boulder gardens make for varied if not "ultra-classic" whitewater.
scouting_portaging: Everything can be scouted. There are 2 large waterfalls that are most likely portages
when_to_go: Late August - early September, when the Stikine is in.
